Attribute.displayValue: class ipv4 "DNS"| 10 match udp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 eq 53| exit|class ipv4 "DHCP"| 10 match udp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 eq 67| exit|class ipv4 "MDM-SERVERS"| 10 match ip 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 1.1.1.2 0.0.0.0| exit|class ipv4 "AD-SERVERS"| 10 match ip 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 1.1.1.3 0.0.0.0| 20 match ip 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 1.1.1.4 0.0.0.0| exit|class ipv4 "APPLE-SERVERS"| 10 remark "Apple NTP Server Access"| 10 match udp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 17.0.0.0 0.255.255.255 eq 123| 20 match tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 17.0.0.0 0.255.255.255 eq 80| 30 match tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 17.0.0.0 0.255.255.255 eq 443| 40 remark "Apple Push Notifications"| 40 match tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 17.0.0.0 0.255.255.255 eq 5223| 50 match tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 17.0.0.0 0.255.255.255 eq 2197| exit|class ipv4 "ANY-ANY"| 10 remark "Any Traffic Match"| 10 ignore ip 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255|||policy user "DOMAIN-ACCESS"| 10 class ipv4 "DHCP" action permit| 20 class ipv4 "DNS" action permit| 30 class ipv4 "MDM-SERVERS" action permit| 40 class ipv4 "AD-SERVERS" action permit| 50 class ipv4 "APPLE-SERVERS" action permit| 60 class ipv4 "ANY-ANY" action deny| exit||aaa authorization user-role name domain-machine| policy "DOMAIN-MACHINE-ACCESS"| reauth-period 28800| vlan-name "USER NETWORK"| exit
